comments:
Using build I200405060200.

I was trying to open launch configuration windows and for unknown reason,
eclipse switched to debug perspective, closed Debug view and was stuck on this
perspective...
I cannot set focus on other opened windows, as soon as I try to select them
using Alt-Tab, focus comes back to Debug perspective. I also cannot open menus
or doing any other action in this window (even system menus or Ctrl-F4 are
unavailable)...

Looking at console I see following NPE stack trace:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 May 06, 2004 17:18:40.392

At this point the only solution I have is to cancel the task using Task Manager
(which cannot be considered as a workaround...)!

I'm seeing less severe versions of this problem.  I get the exception and the
dialog doesn't open, but otherwise my workbench remains responsive.
*** Bug 61440 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Kim, if you can recreate this then we need to investigate, otherwise i suspect 
it has been fixed by the numerous changes in the last month.

We are unable to reproduce this in I20040616 (1200) and 3.0RC2.  Am marking 
this as Resolved/WorksForMe.  This has likely been fixed as a result of many 
other similar problems in this area.
